item.description: Date: Tuesday, July 29, 2025 3:30 PM - 5:00 PM - Please join us for a farewell reception in honor of Rosaline May Lee, our Vice President & Chief Strategy Officer for Institutional Impact. Please join us to thank her and wish her all the best in her next endeavor.

item.title: Division of Human Resources Professional Development Workshop: “Leading from Anywhere”
item.description: At Rensselaer, we maintain that “leadership” involves a learnable set of actions and behaviors that is available to everyone. Whether it be leading a particular project or initiative, assisting others in overcoming obstacles and capitalizing on opportunities, or catalyzing co-creation with colleagues. In this workshop, participants will explore the tenants that comprise everyday leadership and discuss the behaviors that define leadership not as positional or based on title, but rather on values.
item.author: Faculty and Staff

item.title: Division of Human Resources Professional Development Seminar- RPI MAX: Setting Goals and Reviewing Results | Aug. 1
item.description:
This seminar will establish the positive effect of transforming the traditional role of planner and evaluator solely from the people-leader to a shared responsibility between leader and direct report. Leaders will experience how to develop and use effective SMART goals to help them, and their employees track progress and accurately evaluate outcomes. In addition, the fundamentals of an impactful performance discussion and the three phased approach of RPI MAX will be explored.
